mapper.select:
select teacher_course.*, teacher.name as teacherName from teacher_course left join teacher on teacher_course.teacher_id = teacher.id
and teacher_course.course_name like concat('%', #{courseName}, '%')
and teacher_course.course_no like concat('%', #{courseNo}, '%')
and teacher_course.semester like concat('%', #{semester}, '%')
and teacher_course.teacher_id = #{teacherId}
